snippet: The meeting would be the first between the president and House and Senate leaders since large portions of the government were forced to close at 12:01 a.m. Tuesday, when the new fiscal year began without agreement on a stopgap spending measure.
abstract: The meeting would be the first between the president and House and Senate leaders since large portions of the government were forced to close at 12:01 a.m. Tuesday, when the new fiscal year began without agreement on a stopgap spending measure.

headline.main: Obama to Meet With Congressional Leaders at White House
